E:/Ausbildung/Semester3/AVR32_Work1/Halos_Development/src/halos_apis/halos_system_api/inc/hsystem_call_table.h File Reference

Go to the source code of this file.

Detailed Description

Manages system calls from usermode (applications) to the halOS kernel (supervisormode), system calls can have max 4 parameters for a syscall (including the ret_params as void pointer)
Parameters:
scall_number specifys the number of the systemcall, see also
See also:
hsystem_call_table in
Parameters:
param1 first parameter
param2 second parameter
param3 third parameter
ret_param can be used as void pointer for everthing or as return parameter
